package a;

class A implements Runnable {
    Thread t;

    A() {
        t = new Thread(this);
        t.start();
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        for (int i = 1; i <= 3; i++) {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(1000);
                System.out.println(3 - i);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
// TODO Auto-generated catch block
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        System.out.println("线程baiA停止了");
    }
}

class B {
    public void show() {
        A a = new A();
        for (int i = 1; i <= 10; i++) {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(500);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            System.out.println(a.t.isAlive());
        }
    }
}

public class aaaaaaa {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        B b = new B();
        b.show();
    }
}
